sentences.sContent: He is not in thrall to the media.
Tomorrow's children will be even more in the thrall of the silicon chip.
sentences.sCn: 以后的孩子们对电脑芯片的依赖甚至会更深。

remMethod.val: thr (看作throw， 扔) + all (一切) → 抛弃一切束缚

trans.tranCn: 奴隶； 束缚； 奴役
trans.tranOther: If you say that someone is in thrall to a person or thing, you mean that they are completely in their power or are greatly influenced by them
